entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 05:00 AM MDT Friday 29 April 2016

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 89 %

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 2. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Friday 29 April 2016
